bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: ① Etiological Agent. of a pathogenic qi resulting from a combination of feng 風 , wind, and xian 涎 , drool, with the generation of the latter stimulated by the former. Ben cao tu jing 本草圖經 Substance Entry lu 蘆：此藥大吐上膈風涎 , “This drug [cures] massive spitting of wind drool from above the diaphragm”.

② Pathological Condition of wind drool blocking the interior of the chest, leading to mental pressure, and fainting with unconsciousness. Shi zai zhi fang 史載之方 2: 風氣一蒸，痰涎並起，而 上填塞胸中，即使人悶倒無知…此名之曰風涎 , “As soon as wind qi steams, both phlegm and drool emerge and rise, leading to a blockage in the chest. This causes that person to experience heart pressure, to fall to the ground, and to lose his conscience…This is called wind drool ”.
